why: Developed a Php client(academic) for pulling your data from dropbox and displaying on a web page. You can pull(download) and push(upload) new files from your configured dropbox account! Courtesy to prof. Leonidas Fegaras
storyParas: Sem 3 Web Data Management project - Dropbox File storage
Developed a php frontend client with which any user can configure his/her account with secret key to pull/push files from/to the configured dropbox storage
Not much of a UI guy, but I enjoyed every bit of frontend as much as the backend
User can upload, download, delete, explore his/her account files in real time. Auth using token
